LanguageData.Apparel_HuskerHood.label: Husker Hood
LanguageData.Apparel_HuskerHood.description: A crude but rugged hood of the ferals.
LanguageData.Apparel_SkulkerHood.label: Skulker Hood
LanguageData.Apparel_SkulkerHood.description: A crude but rugged hood of the ferals.
LanguageData.Apparel_ThumperHood.label: Thumper Hood
LanguageData.Apparel_ThumperHood.description: A crude but rugged hood of the ferals.
LanguageData.Apparel_GrinderHelmet.label: Grinder Helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_GrinderHelmet.description: A odd looking rusty bucket helmet.
LanguageData.Apparel_ScorcherHelmet.label: Feral Gas Mask
LanguageData.Slag_Plate_Crude.label: Feral Plate Armour
LanguageData.Slag_Plate_Crude.description: Constructed of recycled slag, this plate armour is encumbering but effective against bludgeoning. The gaps in the plates render it almost useless against animals, bullets, or fire. It's made of metal, so don't get electrocuted while wearing this.
LanguageData.Slag_Plate_Improved.label: Spiked Feral Plate Armour
LanguageData.Slag_Plate_Improved.description: An improvement of the crude slag plate armour, it's very effective in gunfights. Flexible joints allow reduced encumbrance. Spikes and paint increase the wearer's badassitude by a factor of +2!
